articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 live or Sportsound commentary, follow live text updates and match stats from Manchester United v Rangers in the Europa League.
articles.title: Manchester United vs Rangers: UEFA Europa League live coverage, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: There has not been much for Tottenham fans to smile about this season, but despite poor league form they are still in three cups - so could this campaign be a successful one?
articles.title: Can Tottenham salvage their campaign with cup success?

articles.description: Four-time Olympic champion Ben Ainslie splits from Sir Jim Ratcliffe's Ineos Britannia America's Cup sailing team.
articles.title: America's Cup: Ben Ainslie splits from Sir Jim Ratcliffe's Ineos Britannia sailing team

articles.description: Novak Djokovic, with the help of Andy Murray, is two wins away from an 11th Australian Open title. BBC Sport analyses their intriguing player-coach partnership.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Inside Novak Djokovic's partnership with coach Andy Murray

articles.description: Two-time defending champion Aryna Sabalenka beats close friend Paula Badosa in commanding fashion to reach the Australian Open final.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka beats Paula Badosa to reach final and continue bid for third Melbourne title

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Back in Action star Jamie Demetriou with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v Back in Action star Jamie Demetriou

articles.description: Manchester United have written to fans to warn them that the club are at risk of breaching spending rules - and that ticket prices could rise as a result.
articles.title: Manchester United at risk of PSR breach, club tell fans

articles.description: Australia batter Grace Harris says she has her eyes on a 16-0 clean sweep in the Women's Ashes after her side won the series outright in Canberra.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: Grace Harris aims for 16-0 clean sweep and to 'embarrass' England

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Wrexham vs Birmingham City in the League One
articles.title: Wrexham vs Birmingham City: League One live match updates & stats

articles.description: Victor Wembanyama inspires the San Antonio Spurs to a 140-110 victory against the Indiana Pacers at Accor Arena in Paris, France.
articles.title: NBA: Victor Wembanyama inspires San Antonio Spurs to victory against Indiana Pacers in Paris
